1.Title: Recharge Chamber
1.Description:
When the 4th hit of Grace's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, all squad members gain 0.25 Energy.
Within the same move, this effect can grant a max of 2 Energy to all squad members.
1.Lore: Efficiency is the lifeblood of engineering, and within Grace's gun barrel resonates its heartbeat.

2.Title: Lightning Piercer
2.Description: When Grace's thrown grenade hits an enemy during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the target's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric RES</color> is reduced by 8.5%, and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup RES</color> is reduced by 8.5%, lasting for 8s.
2.Lore:
"Dissecting" complex mechanical structures is Grace's greatest hobby, even in the midst of battle.
How does it feel to get taken apart, with every vulnerability laid bare?

3.Title: Chief Mechanic
3.Lore:
Grace was personally involved in writing the "Belobog Industries' Construction Safety Guidelines."
She's also the employee who violated the "no dangerous explosives at construction sites" policy the most times.

4.Title: Burst Capacitor
4.Description: When Grace uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, she gains 6 stacks of Charge (max 6 stacks). When her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: High-Pressure Spike</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Quick Inspection</color> hits an enemy, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, increasing her Energy Generation Rate of the attack by 20%.
4.Lore:
Anton suspected within the component Grace referred to as the "Electropulse Recycling Module," there was, in fact, an Ether hamster tirelessly generating energy around the clock.
"Can you equip my bro with one too?"

5.Title: "Frosty Cold Iron Witch"
5.Lore: The "Frosty Cold Iron Witch" is capable of taming any mechanical beast, or at least that's what the anonymous fan who came up with the name thinks.

6.Title: Detonation Trigger
6.Description: When all <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color> stacks are consumed to activate a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, Grace's skill is enhanced, tossing an extra grenade and increasing each grenade's DMG to 200%.
6.Lore:
The average blood temperature of Belobog Heavy Industries' employees is ninety-eight degrees Celsius. Grace is often viewed as the safety valve keeping them all from boiling.
When even Grace gives up control, it's a sign for everyone to cover their ears.

DescriptionByLevel.1: When Grace's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> hits an enemy and deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, she gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color> (up to 8 stacks). Upon reaching maximum stacks, using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume all stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color>, increasing the accumulated <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> by <color=#2BAD00>65%</color>.

Upon reaching maximum stacks, using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume all stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color>, increasing the accumulated <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> by <color=#2BAD00>75.8%</color>.

Upon reaching maximum stacks, using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume all stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color>, increasing the accumulated <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> by <color=#2BAD00>86.6%</color>.

Upon reaching maximum stacks, using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume all stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color>, increasing the accumulated <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> by <color=#2BAD00>97.5%</color>.

Upon reaching maximum stacks, using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume all stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color>, increasing the accumulated <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> by <color=#2BAD00>108.3%</color>.

Upon reaching maximum stacks, using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume all stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color>, increasing the accumulated <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> by <color=#2BAD00>119.1%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.7: When Grace's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> hits an enemy and deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, she gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color> (up to 8 stacks). Upon reaching maximum stacks, using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume all stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color>, increasing the accumulated <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> by <color=#2BAD00>130%</color>.

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Tech Support Dept.
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Upon hitting an enemy with an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the next <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> effect inflicted on the target increases <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> DMG by 18%. This effect can stack up to 2 times, and each enemy can trigger it once per skill use. Resets when the <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> effect ends.

118100001.Title: Basic Attack: High-Pressure Spike
118100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 attacks, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
While launching <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to attack while moving. This allows Grace to reposition herself and deal <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
While Grace is launching <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>, her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> combo will not be interrupted by her <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>.

118100002.Title: Special Attack: Obstruction Removal
118100002.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Throws a grenade to the front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Upon use, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to change directions.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

118100003.Title: EX Special Attack: Supercharged Obstruction Removal
118100003.Description:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Leap in the air and throw two grenades to the front, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Upon use, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to change directions.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

118110015.Title: EX Special Attack: Supercharged Obstruction Removal

118100004.Title: Dodge: Safety Regulation
118100004.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

118100005.Title: Dash Attack: Quick Inspection
118100005.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slide forward while shooting, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

118100006.Title: Dodge Counter: Violation Penalty
118100006.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Throws a grenade at enemies, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

118100007.Title: Chain Attack: Collaborative Construction
118100007.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Throws three grenades into the air then strafes to detonate them, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

118100008.Title: Ultimate: Demolition Blast - Beware
118100008.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Throws a custom grenade which explodes in the air and splits into four smaller grenades, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

118100010.Title: Quick Assist: Incident Management
118100010.Description:
When the active character is launched in the air, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Throws a grenade at the enemy, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

118100011.Title: Evasive Assist: Rapid Risk Response
118100011.Description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Dodges the enemy's attack and activates <color=#FFFFFF>Vital View</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

118100012.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Counter Volt Needle
118100012.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after an <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color> to activate:
Unleashes a spinning hail of bullets against enemies in front and throws a grenade, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
